document_data.name: Jessup
document_data.mainbody: '''Jessup''' was a traveler along the [[High Road]] between [[Neverwinter]] and [[Luskan]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Jessup had brown hair and a thin mustache.
document_data.History: Sometime around {{Yearlink|1490}}, Jessup joined the merchant's caravan of [[Tollin]] and his crew going from Neverwinter to Luskan, accompanied by members of the [[Order of the Burning Dawn]]. However, during the journey, Jessup claimed to have been bitten by [[Guen]], the girl [[Jaena]]'s dog, and demanded that the dog be put down. However, it was revealed by the [[Champion of the Burning Dawn]] that Jessup had provoked the dog in a drunken state by trying to force-feed it brandy, and the case was dropped.
